summary: Highly motivated and dedicated  Activity Director with strong communication skills, exceptional problem solving and strong decision making skills, meeting and exceeding monthly and weekly budgets, exceptional skills in management, scheduling/planning events and programs, demonstrated leader in all aspects, meeting project deadlines, multi-tasking, working as a team member, training/hiring new staff, learning new projects quickly and communicating new ideas clearly and effectively.
headline: Activity Director ADC, VW

message.text:
Hello Linkedin,
I am posting this with a heavy heart. My Son was involved in a fatal car accident while leaving work 05-04-2024. He was an employee working for Austin industrial on nights. This has left me with some unexpected expenses. We came from Brazil with nothing, became citizen through the correct channels. The goal is to return him to Brazil where he was born and has family. Please disregard if I am out of line.
Thank you.

https://lnkd.in/gCXDJxMP
